channel.title: Quest on XenoBlog
channel.description: Recent content in Quest on XenoBlog

item.title: Powershell as a webservice
item.description: Seems as if Quest has been doing some really cool things with Powershell, from what I can read, they have “rolled” it up as a webservice, meaning that you can now run your Powershell scripts over HTTPS from either you local machine, your phone, anything that supports a newer web browser.
